Help Manager Routines

Getting and Setting the Font Name and Size

Using the HMGetFont and HMGetFontSize functions, you can get information about the font name and size currently used for text strings displayed in help balloons.
Using the HMSetFont and HMSetFontSize functions, you can change the font name and size.
